prodNameC: "西門子" 德國麻疹病毒M試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Lite reagent: inactivated rubella virus antigen (strain HPV77) (~0.27μg/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with preservatives
Solid phase: anti-human IgMμ monoclonal antibody (~0.14 mg/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in buffer with  preservatives
Calibrators: processed human plasma positive for rubella IgM antibodies with preservatives
Controls: processed human plasma negative and positive for rubella IgM antibodies with preservatives
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 用於體外診斷，利用ADVIA® CentaurTM 系統定性檢測血清或血漿中的德國麻疹病毒免疫球蛋白M抗體。
mdFormat: 50 tests (02633319, 117733)2x3 mL Negative, 2x3 mL Positive QC (00347629, 117734)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3510 德國麻疹病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 333 CONEY ST. EAST WALPOLE, MA 02032, U.S.A.
